comments.text: I was a veteran Rec Room player back when the game first introduced using the In-game currency "tokens" to purchase advantages in user-made rooms, and i didnt mind then, because there was a healthy economy where just playing the game every day gave you tokens, but after years of negligence from the parent company, Rec Room's economy would hyperinflate and monetize into one of the most predatory VR games ever, not to mention the  gross AI generation features that have been added recently
